attributes.action: Add a box on ballot papers to allow one to vote for "none of the above" to demonstrate an interest in the political process but display disillusionment with the parties vying for power.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will allow the electorate to voice the opinion that they have lost faith not in the process of parliamentary democracy but rather the way that all parties have tried to twist it to their own ends. It will avoid the claim by the parties that the electorate needs to be re-engaged in the process.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
